persons.name: Jeffrey Epstein
persons.reason: Central figure in trafficking investigation. Convicted in 2008, arrested again in 2019 on federal charges.
persons.details: Financier and convicted sex offender. Maintained a network of associates across properties in New York, Palm Beach, New Mexico, and the US Virgin Islands. Found dead in his cell in August 2019.

persons.name: Person A
persons.reason: Co-conspirator. Recruited and groomed victims. Found guilty on multiple federal charges in 2021.
persons.details: Served as primary accomplice over many years. Convicted on five federal charges including sex trafficking of a minor.

persons.name: Person B
persons.reason: Frequent visitor to multiple properties. Named in flight logs and victim testimony.
persons.details: Appears on flight manifests numerous times. Referenced in depositions as a regular guest at private residences.

persons.name: Person C
persons.reason: Managed financial transactions and shell companies linked to the operation.
persons.details: Connected through complex financial instruments and corporate structures across multiple jurisdictions.

persons.name: Person D
persons.reason: Property manager and scheduler. Had access to private aircraft and all residences.
persons.details: Managed logistics for travel and properties. Key figure in organizing activities and maintaining operational records.

persons.name: Person E
persons.reason: Appears in personal address book and flight logs. Social connections documented through photographs.
persons.details: Public figure with documented social ties spanning several years. Full extent of involvement remains unclear.

persons.name: Person F
persons.reason: Referenced in victim depositions. Visited properties on multiple occasions between 2002-2005.
persons.details: Named by multiple witnesses in sworn testimony. Has publicly denied any wrongdoing or knowledge of criminal activity.

persons.name: Person G
persons.reason: Connected through financial records and corporate correspondence. Business dealings documented.
persons.details: Professional relationship documented through corporate records, email correspondence, and wire transfer logs.

persons.name: Person H
persons.reason: Listed in seized address book. Visited island property according to staff testimony.
persons.details: Prominent individual with documented visits to private island. Specific nature of involvement under ongoing review.

persons.name: Person I
persons.reason: Single mention in seized documents. Context and nature of relationship unclear.
persons.details: Name appears in personal address book. No further corroborating documentation has been found to date.

persons.name: Person J
persons.reason: Referenced in one deposition by a single witness. Limited corroborating information available.
persons.details: Mentioned by a single witness during testimony. Connection may be indirect or purely professional in nature.

persons.name: Person K
persons.reason: Name found in seized correspondence. No direct evidence of involvement in criminal activity.
persons.details: Appears in email records recovered from seized devices. May have been contacted for legitimate professional services.

persons.name: Person L
persons.reason: Listed in flight logs as a passenger on one occasion. No further documentation of association.
persons.details: Name appears on a single flight manifest. No additional evidence of relationship or involvement has been identified.

evidence.label: COURT FILINGS
evidence.name: Federal Case Documents
evidence.notes: Primary court filings, indictments, and legal proceedings from 2019 federal case.

evidence.label: FLIGHT LOGS
evidence.name: Aviation Records
evidence.notes: Passenger manifests from private aircraft. Documents travel patterns over multiple years.

evidence.label: FINANCIAL RECORDS
evidence.name: Wire Transfers & Shell Companies
evidence.notes: Suspicious financial transactions and corporate structures identified across multiple jurisdictions.

evidence.label: TIMELINE
evidence.text: Key dates: 2005-2008 peak activity period. 2008 plea deal in Florida. 2019 federal re-arrest. Investigation ongoing.
